body_html:
I am still encountering this issue on the latest build from source.

I am running Ubuntu 16.04 with CUDA 8.0.61 and CUDNN 5110.
When I run the benchmark script above, I get:

CUDNN  VERSION 5110
Float
batch_size: 1   dilation: 256   seqlen: 110250   time 0.322431
batch_size: 1   dilation: 128   seqlen: 110250   time 0.228681
batch_size: 1   dilation: 64    seqlen: 110250   time 0.188049
batch_size: 1   dilation: 32    seqlen: 110250   time 0.166691
batch_size: 1   dilation: 16    seqlen: 110250   time 0.155784
batch_size: 1   dilation: 8     seqlen: 110250   time 0.150233
batch_size: 1   dilation: 4     seqlen: 110250   time 0.147543
batch_size: 1   dilation: 2     seqlen: 110250   time 0.145513
batch_size: 1   dilation: 1     seqlen: 110250   time 0.057228
batch_size: 8   dilation: 256   seqlen: 110250   time 2.488083
batch_size: 8   dilation: 128   seqlen: 110250   time 1.827918
batch_size: 8   dilation: 64    seqlen: 110250   time 1.503108
batch_size: 8   dilation: 32    seqlen: 110250   time 1.333321
batch_size: 8   dilation: 16    seqlen: 110250   time 1.245614
batch_size: 8   dilation: 8     seqlen: 110250   time 1.201425
batch_size: 8   dilation: 4     seqlen: 110250   time 1.178945
batch_size: 8   dilation: 2     seqlen: 110250   time 1.163030
batch_size: 8   dilation: 1     seqlen: 110250   time 0.256762

body:
I am still encountering this issue on the latest build from source. 

I am running Ubuntu 16.04 with CUDA 8.0.61 and CUDNN 5110. 
When I run the benchmark script above, I get:

```
CUDNN  VERSION 5110
Float
batch_size: 1   dilation: 256   seqlen: 110250   time 0.322431
batch_size: 1   dilation: 128   seqlen: 110250   time 0.228681
batch_size: 1   dilation: 64    seqlen: 110250   time 0.188049
batch_size: 1   dilation: 32    seqlen: 110250   time 0.166691
batch_size: 1   dilation: 16    seqlen: 110250   time 0.155784
batch_size: 1   dilation: 8     seqlen: 110250   time 0.150233
batch_size: 1   dilation: 4     seqlen: 110250   time 0.147543
batch_size: 1   dilation: 2     seqlen: 110250   time 0.145513
batch_size: 1   dilation: 1     seqlen: 110250   time 0.057228
batch_size: 8   dilation: 256   seqlen: 110250   time 2.488083
batch_size: 8   dilation: 128   seqlen: 110250   time 1.827918
batch_size: 8   dilation: 64    seqlen: 110250   time 1.503108
batch_size: 8   dilation: 32    seqlen: 110250   time 1.333321
batch_size: 8   dilation: 16    seqlen: 110250   time 1.245614
batch_size: 8   dilation: 8     seqlen: 110250   time 1.201425
batch_size: 8   dilation: 4     seqlen: 110250   time 1.178945
batch_size: 8   dilation: 2     seqlen: 110250   time 1.163030
batch_size: 8   dilation: 1     seqlen: 110250   time 0.256762
```
